summary: This forensic report from ABC Forensic Services Laboratory details the comparison of fired cartridge cases associated with two Bramblewood County Sheriffâ€™s Office cases. The examination concluded that the cartridge case CW-8A and the test cartridge case BCSO-3.5 were fired by the same firearm. The Glock 17 pistol (BCSO-3) was not utilized in this examination.
conclusion: The examination determined that the cartridge case CW-8A and the test cartridge case BCSO-3.5 were fired by the same firearm.

description: (1) Black in color Glock 17 pistol, 9x19 mm caliber (S/N: obliterated) and (1) unloaded black in color Glock 9mm magazine
Laboratory test cartridge case fired by Item BCSO-3 (Glock 17 pistol)
(1) Fired bronze and silver in color cartridge case (headstamp: 9mm Luger), collected from floor near decedent
